description.ruby-sapphire:
Raises SP. ATK and SP. DEF
by focusing the mind.
description.emerald:
Raises SP. ATK and SP. DEF
by focusing the mind.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The user focuses
its mind to raise
the SP. ATK and
SP. DEF stats.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user quietly
focuses its mind and
calms its spirit to
raise its Sp. Atk and
Sp. Def stats.
